sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function Footer() { return (
{/* Government Seal and Main Info */}
{/* Government Seal */}

Government of India

Ministry of Digital Affairs

SAHYatri - Digital Government Services Portal

{/* Main Footer Grid */}
{/* Quick Links */}

Quick Links

  • Citizen Services
  • Government Schemes
  • Digital Certificates
  • Online Applications
  • Document Verification
{/* Services */}

Services

  • Aadhaar Services
  • PAN Card Services
  • Passport Services
  • Voter ID Services
  • License Services
{/* Contact Information */}

Contact Info

New Delhi, India
1800-XXX-XXXX
info@sahyatri.gov.in
{/* Legal & Policies */}

Legal & Policies

  • Privacy Policy
  • Terms of Service
  • Accessibility Statement
  • RTI Information
  • Copyright Policy
{/* Social Media Icons */}
{/* Bottom Copyright */}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} Government of India. All rights reserved. | This is an official website of the Government of India | Last updated: {new Date().toLocaleDateString()}

Website Content Managed by Ministry of Digital Affairs, Government of India

); } export default Footer;
